original: Passāmi suddhanti passāmi suddhaṁ, dakkhāmi suddhaṁ, olokemi suddhaṁ, nijjhāyāmi suddhaṁ, upaparikkhāmi suddhaṁ.
analyzed: passāmi suddha anti passāmi suddha dakkhāmi suddha olokemi suddha nijjhāyāmi suddha upaparikkhāmi suddha

original: Paramaṁ aroganti paramaṁ ārogyappattaṁ tāṇappattaṁ leṇappattaṁ saraṇappattaṁ abhayappattaṁ accutappattaṁ amatappattaṁ nibbānappattanti—
analyzed: paramam aroganti paramam ārogya ppattam tāṇa ppattam leṇa ppattam saraṇa ppattam abhaya ppattam accuta ppattam amata ppattam nibbāna ppattam ti
diṭṭhena sa suddhi narassa hoti iti

original: Cakkhuviññāṇaṁ rūpadassanena narassa suddhi visuddhi parisuddhi, mutti vimutti parimutti hoti, naro sujjhati visujjhati parisujjhati, muccati vimuccati parimuccatīti—
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇam rūpa dassanena narassa suddhi visuddhi parisuddhi mutti vimutti parimutti hoti naraḥ sujjhati visujjhati parisujjhati muccati vimuccati parimuccati iti

original: Evaṁ abhijānanto ājānanto vijānanto paṭivijānanto paṭivijjhanto.
analyzed: evam abhijānantaḥ ājānantaḥ vijānantaḥ paṭivijānantaḥ paṭivijjhantaḥ

original: “Idaṁ paramaṁ aggaṁ seṭṭhaṁ visiṭṭhaṁ pāmokkhaṁ uttamaṁ pavaran”ti ñatvā jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtaṁ katvāti—
analyzed: idam paramam aggam seṭṭham visiṭṭham pāmokkham uttamam pavaranti ñatvā jānitvā tulayitvā tīrayitvā vibhāvayitvā vibhūtam katvā iti
suddha anupassī iti pacceti ñāṇan ti

original: Yo suddhaṁ passati, so suddhānupassī, pacceti ñāṇanti cakkhuviññāṇaṁ rūpadassanena ñāṇanti pacceti, maggoti pacceti, pathoti pacceti, niyyānanti paccetīti—
analyzed: yaḥ suddham passati saḥ suddha anupassī pacceti ñāṇanti cakkhu viññāṇam rūpa dassanena ñāṇanti pacceti maggo ti pacceti patho ti pacceti niyyānanti pacceti iti
suddha anupassī iti pacceti ñāṇan ti

original: Diṭṭhī hi naṁ pāva tathā vadānaṁ.
analyzed: diṭṭhī hi nam pāva tathā vadāna
diṭṭhena ce suddhi narassa hoti iti

original: Cakkhuviññāṇaṁ rūpadassanena ce narassa suddhi visuddhi parisuddhi, mutti vimutti parimutti hoti, naro sujjhati visujjhati parisujjhati, muccati vimuccati parimuccatīti—
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇam rūpa dassanena ce narassa suddhi visuddhi parisuddhi mutti vimutti parimutti hoti naraḥ sujjhati visujjhati parisujjhati muccati vimuccati parimuccati iti

original: Ñāṇena vā so pajahāti dukkhanti cakkhuviññāṇaṁ rūpadassanena ce naro jātidukkhaṁ
analyzed: ñāṇena vā so pajahāti dukkhanti cakkhu viññāṇam rūpa dassanena ce naraḥ jāti dukkha

original: pajahati, jarādukkhaṁ pajahati, byādhidukkhaṁ pajahati, maraṇadukkhaṁ pajahati, sokaparidevadukkhadomanassupāyāsadukkhaṁ pajahatīti—
analyzed: pajahati jarā dukkham pajahati byādhi dukkham pajahati maraṇa dukkham pajahati soka parideva dukkha domanassa upāyāsa dukkham pajahati iti

original: Aññena asuddhimaggena micchāpaṭipadāya aniyyānikapathena aññatra satipaṭṭhānehi aññatra

analyzed: sammappadhānehi aññatra iddhipādehi aññatra indriyehi aññatra balehi aññatra bojjhaṅgehi

original: aññatra ariyā aṭṭhaṅgikā maggā naro sujjhati visujjhati parisujjhati, muccati vimuccati parimuccati.

original: Sopadhīkoti sarāgo sadoso samoho samāno sataṇho sadiṭṭhi sakileso saupādānoti—
analyzed: sa upadhīkaḥ iti sa rāgaḥ sa dosaḥ sa mohaḥ sa māno sa taṇhaḥ sa diṭṭhi sa kileso sa upādānaḥ iti

original: Diṭṭhī hi naṁ pāva tathā vadānanti.

analyzed: sā ava diṭṭhi tam puggalam pāvadati
iti vā ayam puggalaḥ micchādiṭṭhikaḥ viparīta dassanaḥ

original: Tathā vadānanti tathā vadantaṁ kathentaṁ bhaṇantaṁ dīpayantaṁ voharantaṁ.
analyzed: tathā tathā vadantam kathentam bhaṇantam dīpayantam voharanta

analyzed: sassataḥ lokaḥ idam eva saccam mogham aññanti tathā vadantam kathentam bhaṇantam dīpayantam voharanta

original: hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā …
analyzed: hoti ca na ca hoti tathāgataḥ param maraṇā

original: neva hoti na na hoti tathāgato paraṁ maraṇā, idameva saccaṁ moghamaññan”ti tathā vadantaṁ kathentaṁ bhaṇantaṁ dīpayantaṁ voharantanti—
analyzed: na iva hoti na na hoti tathāgataḥ param maraṇā idam eva saccam mogham aññanti tathā vadantam kathentam bhaṇantam dīpayantam voharantam iti

original: diṭṭhī hi naṁ pāva tathā vadānaṁ.
analyzed: diṭṭhī hi nam pāva tathā vadāna

original: Diṭṭhī hi naṁ pāva tathā vadānan”ti.

original: Na brāhmaṇo aññato suddhimāha diṭṭhe sute sīlavate mute vāti.

brāhmaṇo ti sattannam dhammānam bāhitattā brāhmaṇo

original: sakkāyadiṭṭhi bāhitā hoti, vicikicchā bāhitā hoti, sīlabbataparāmāso bāhito hoti, rāgo bāhito hoti, doso bāhito hoti, moho bāhito hoti, māno bāhito hoti.
analyzed: sakkāya diṭṭhi bāhitā hoti vicikicchā bāhitā hoti sīlabbata parāmāsaḥ bāhitaḥ hoti rāgaḥ bāhitaḥ hoti dosaḥ bāhitaḥ hoti mohaḥ bāhitaḥ hoti mānaḥ bāhitaḥ hoti

original: Bāhitāssa honti pāpakā akusalā dhammā saṅkilesikā ponobhavikā sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇiyā.
analyzed: bāhitā assa honti pāpakā akusalā dhammā saṅkilesikā ponobhavikā sadarā dukkha vipākā āyatim jāti jarā maraṇiyā
asitaḥ ta ādi pavuccate sa brahmā
na brāhmaṇaḥ aññatas suddhim āha ati

original: Brāhmaṇo aññena asuddhimaggena micchāpaṭipadāya aniyyānikapathena aññatra satipaṭṭhānehi

analyzed: aññatra sammappadhānehi aññatra iddhipādehi aññatra indriyehi aññatra balehi aññatra

original: bojjhaṅgehi aññatra ariyena aṭṭhaṅgikena maggena suddhiṁ visuddhiṁ parisuddhiṁ, muttiṁ

original: vimuttiṁ parimuttiṁ, nāha na katheti na bhaṇati na dīpayati na voharatīti—
analyzed: vimuttim parimutti na āha na katheti na bhaṇati na dīpayati na vā uharati iti
santi ke samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ diṭṭhi suddhikā

original: Te ekaccānaṁ rūpānaṁ dassanaṁ maṅgalaṁ paccenti, ekaccānaṁ rūpānaṁ dassanaṁ amaṅgalaṁ paccenti.
analyzed: te ekaccānam rūpānam dassanam maṅgalam paccenti ekaccānam rūpānam dassanam amaṅgalam paccenti

analyzed: khandhe āropetvā gacchantam passanti puṇṇa ghaṭam passanti rohita maccham passanti

analyzed: ājaññam passanti ājaññaratham passanti usabham passanti gokapilam passanti

analyzed: nagga samaṇakam passanti kharam passanti khara yānam passanti eka yutta yānam passanti

analyzed: kāṇam passanti kuṇim passanti khañjam passanti pakkha hatam passanti jiṇṇaka
ime te samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ diṭṭhi suddhikā

original: Te diṭṭhena suddhiṁ visuddhiṁ parisuddhiṁ muttiṁ vimuttiṁ parimuttiṁ paccenti.
analyzed: te diṭṭhena suddhim visuddhim parisuddhim muttim vimuttim parimuttim paccenti

original: Te ekaccānaṁ saddānaṁ savanaṁ maṅgalaṁ paccenti, ekaccānaṁ saddānaṁ savanaṁ amaṅgalaṁ paccenti.
analyzed: te ekaccānam saddānam savanam maṅgalam paccenti ekaccānam saddānam savanam amaṅgalam paccenti

original: Te kālato vuṭṭhahitvā abhimaṅgalagatāni saddāni suṇanti—
analyzed: te kālataḥ vuṭṭhahitvā abhimaṅgala gatāni saddāni suṇanti

original: vaḍḍhāti vā vaḍḍhamānāti vā puṇṇāti vā phussāti vā asokāti vā sumanāti vā sunakkhattāti vā sumaṅgalāti vā sirīti vā sirīvaḍḍhāti vā.

original: Kāṇoti vā kuṇīti vā khañjoti vā pakkhahatoti vā jiṇṇakoti vā byādhikoti vā matoti vā chindanti vā bhindanti vā daḍḍhanti vā naṭṭhanti vā natthīti vā.

ime te samaṇa brāhmaṇā suta suddhikā

original: Te sutena suddhiṁ visuddhiṁ parisuddhiṁ muttiṁ vimuttiṁ parimuttiṁ paccenti.
analyzed: te sutena suddhim visuddhim parisuddhim muttim vimuttim parimuttim paccenti

original: Te sīlamattena saṁyamamattena saṁvaramattena avītikkamamattena suddhiṁ visuddhiṁ parisuddhiṁ muttiṁ vimuttiṁ parimuttiṁ paccenti.
analyzed: te sīla mattena sayama mattena savara mattena a vītikkama mattena suddhim visuddhim parisuddhim muttim vimuttim parimuttim paccenti

original: “catūhi kho ahaṁ, gahapati, dhammehi samannāgataṁ purisapuggalaṁ paññāpemi sampannakusalaṁ paramakusalaṁ uttamapattippattaṁ samaṇaṁ ayojjaṁ.
analyzed: catūhi kho aha gahapati dhammehi samannāgatam purisa puggalam paññāpemi sampanna kusalam parama kusalam uttama patti pattam samaṇam ayojja

original: Idha, gahapati, na kāyena pāpakaṁ kammaṁ karoti, na pāpikaṁ vācaṁ bhāsati, na pāpakaṁ saṅkappaṁ saṅkappati, na pāpakaṁ ājīvaṁ ājīvati.
analyzed: idha gahapati na kāyena pāpakam kammam karoti na pāpikam vācam bhāsati na pāpakam saṅkappam saṅkappati na pāpakam ājīvam ājīvati

original: Imehi kho ahaṁ, gahapati, catūhi dhammehi samannāgataṁ purisapuggalaṁ paññāpemi sampannakusalaṁ paramakusalaṁ uttamapattippattaṁ samaṇaṁ ayojjaṁ”.
analyzed: imehi kho aha gahapati catūhi dhammehi samannāgatam purisa puggalam paññāpemi sampanna kusalam parama kusalam uttama patti pattam samaṇam ayojja

original: Evamevaṁ santeke samaṇabrāhmaṇā sīlasuddhikā, te sīlamattena saṁyamamattena saṁvaramattena avītikkamamattena suddhiṁ visuddhiṁ parisuddhiṁ muttiṁ vimuttiṁ parimuttiṁ paccenti.
analyzed: evam evam santi ike samaṇa brāhmaṇā sīla suddhikā te sīla mattena sayama mattena savara mattena a vītikkama mattena suddhim visuddhim parisuddhim muttim vimuttim parimuttim paccenti

original: Te hatthivatikā vā honti, assavatikā vā honti, govatikā vā honti, kukkuravatikā vā
analyzed: te hatthivatikāḥ vā honti assavatikāḥ vā honti govatikāḥ vā honti kukkuravatikāḥ vā

original: honti, kākavatikā vā honti, vāsudevavatikā vā honti, baladevavatikā vā honti, puṇṇabhaddavatikā
analyzed: honti kākavatikāḥ vā honti vāsudevavatikāḥ vā honti baladevavatikāḥ vā honti puṇṇabhaddavatikā

analyzed: vā honti maṇibhaddavatikāḥ vā honti aggivatikāḥ vā honti nāgavatikāḥ vā honti supaṇṇavatikā

original: vā honti, brahmavatikā vā honti, devavatikā vā honti, disāvatikā vā honti.
analyzed: vā honti brahmavatikāḥ vā honti devavatikāḥ vā honti disāvatikāḥ vā honti

original: Te vatena suddhiṁ visuddhiṁ parisuddhiṁ muttiṁ vimuttiṁ parimuttiṁ paccenti.
analyzed: te vatena suddhim visuddhim parisuddhim muttim vimuttim parimuttim paccenti

original: Te kālato uṭṭhahitvā pathaviṁ āmasanti, haritaṁ āmasanti, gomayaṁ āmasanti, kacchapaṁ
analyzed: te kālatas uṭṭhahitvā pathavim āmasanti haritam āmasanti gomayam āmasanti kacchapa

analyzed: āmasanti phālam akkamanti tilavāham āmasanti phussa tilam khādanti phussa tela

original: makkhenti, phussadantakaṭṭhaṁ khādanti, phussamattikāya nhāyanti, phussasāṭakaṁ nivāsenti,
analyzed: makkhenti phussa danta kaṭṭham khādanti phussa mattikāya nhāyanti phussa sāṭakam nivāsenti

original: Te mutena suddhiṁ visuddhiṁ parisuddhiṁ muttiṁ vimuttiṁ parimuttiṁ paccenti.
analyzed: te mutena suddhim visuddhim parisuddhim muttim vimuttim parimuttim paccenti

original: Brāhmaṇo diṭṭhasuddhiyāpi suddhiṁ nāha, sutasuddhiyāpi suddhiṁ nāha, sīlasuddhiyāpi
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ diṭṭha suddhiyā api suddhim na āha suta suddhiyā api suddhim na āha sīla suddhiyā api

original: suddhiṁ nāha, vatasuddhiyāpi suddhiṁ nāha, mutasuddhiyāpi suddhiṁ nāha na katheti
analyzed: suddhim na āha suddhim na āha suddhim na āha na kathā iti

original: na bhaṇati na dīpayati na voharatīti—
analyzed: na bhaṇati na dīpayati na vā uharati iti

original: na brāhmaṇo aññato suddhimāha diṭṭhe sute sīlavate mute vā.
analyzed: na brāhmaṇaḥ aññatas suddhim āha diṭṭhe sute sīlavate mute vā

original: Puññaṁ vuccati yaṁ kiñci tedhātukaṁ kusalābhisaṅkhāraṁ, apuññaṁ vuccati sabbaṁ akusalaṁ.
analyzed: puññam vuccati yam kiñci tedhātukam kusala abhisaṅkhāra apuññam vuccati sabbam akusala

original: Yato puññābhisaṅkhāro ca apuññābhisaṅkhāro ca āneñjābhisaṅkhāro ca pahīnā honti ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā;
analyzed: yatas puñña abhisaṅkhāro ca apuñña abhisaṅkhāro ca āneñja abhisaṅkhāro ca pahīnāḥ honti ucchinna mūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatim an uppāda dhammā

original: ettāvatā puññe ca pāpe ca na limpati na palimpati na upalimpati alitto apalitto anūpalitto nikkhanto nissaṭo vippamutto visaññutto vimariyādikatena cetasā viharatīti—
analyzed: ettāvatā puññe ca pāpe ca na limpati na palimpati na upalimpati a littaḥ apalittaḥ an upalittaḥ nikkhantaḥ nissaṭaḥ vippamuttaḥ visaññuttaḥ vimariyādikatena cetasā viharati iti
puññe ca pāpe ca an upalittaḥ

original: Attañjahoti taṇhāvasena diṭṭhivasena gahitaṁ parāmaṭṭhaṁ abhiniviṭṭhaṁ ajjhositaṁ adhimuttaṁ, sabbaṁ taṁ cattaṁ hoti vantaṁ muttaṁ pahīnaṁ paṭinissaṭṭhaṁ.
analyzed: attañjahoti taṇhā vasena diṭṭhi vasena gahitam parāmaṭṭham abhiniviṭṭham ajjhositam adhimutta sabbam tam cattam hoti vantam muttam pahīnam paṭinissaṭṭha

original: Nayidha pakubbamānoti puññābhisaṅkhāraṁ vā apuññābhisaṅkhāraṁ vā āneñjābhisaṅkhāraṁ vā apakubbamāno ajanayamāno asañjanayamāno anibbattayamāno anabhinibbattayamānoti—
analyzed: na yidha pakubbamānoti puñña abhisaṅkhāram vā a puñña abhisaṅkhāram vā āneñja abhisaṅkhāram vā a pakubbamānaḥ a janayamānaḥ a sañjanayamānaḥ a nibbattayamānaḥ an abhinibbattayamānaḥ iti
puññe ca pāpe ca an upalittaḥ

original: Purimaṁ satthāraṁ pahāya paraṁ satthāraṁ nissitā;
analyzed: purimam satthāram pahāya param satthāram nissitā

original: purimaṁ dhammakkhānaṁ pahāya aparaṁ dhammakkhānaṁ nissitā;
analyzed: purimam dhammakkhānam pahāya aparam dhammakkhānam nissitā

original: purimaṁ gaṇaṁ pahāya aparaṁ gaṇaṁ nissitā;
analyzed: purimam gaṇam pahāya aparam gaṇam nissitā

original: purimaṁ diṭṭhiṁ pahāya aparaṁ diṭṭhiṁ nissitā;

original: purimaṁ paṭipadaṁ pahāya aparaṁ paṭipadaṁ nissitā;
analyzed: purimam paṭipadam pahāya aparam paṭipadam nissitā

original: purimaṁ maggaṁ pahāya aparaṁ maggaṁ nissitā sannissitā allīnā upagatā ajjhositā adhimuttāti—
analyzed: purimam maggam pahāya aparam maggam nissitā sannissitā allīnā upagatā ajjhositā adhimuttā ati

original: Yo rāgo sārāgo …pe… abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṁ.
analyzed: yaḥ rāgaḥ sa arāgaḥ pe abhijjhā lobho akusala mūla

original: Ejānugāti ejānugā ejānugatā ejānusaṭā ejāya pannā patitā abhibhūtā pariyādinnacittā.
analyzed: ejānugā ati ejānugā ejānugatā ejānusaṭā ejāya pannā patitā abhibhūtā pariyādinna cittā

original: Te na taranti saṅganti rāgasaṅgaṁ dosasaṅgaṁ mohasaṅgaṁ mānasaṅgaṁ diṭṭhisaṅgaṁ kilesasaṅgaṁ
analyzed: te na taranti saṅganti rāga saṅgam dosa saṅgam moha saṅgam māna saṅgam diṭṭhi saṅgam kilesa saṅga

original: duccaritasaṅgaṁ na taranti na uttaranti na pataranti na samatikkamanti na vītivattantīti—
analyzed: duccarita saṅgam na taranti na uttaranti na pataranti na samatikkamanti na vītivattanti iti

original: Te uggahāyanti nirassajantīti satthāraṁ gaṇhanti, taṁ muñcitvā aññaṁ satthāraṁ gaṇhanti;
analyzed: te uggahāyanti nirassajanti iti satthāram gaṇhanti tam muñcitvā aññam satthāram gaṇhanti

original: dhammakkhānaṁ gaṇhanti, taṁ muñcitvā aññaṁ dhammakkhānaṁ gaṇhanti;
analyzed: dhammakkhānam gaṇhanti tam muñcitvā aññam dhammakkhānam gaṇhanti

original: gaṇaṁ gaṇhanti, taṁ muñcitvā aññaṁ gaṇaṁ gaṇhanti;
analyzed: gaṇam gaṇhanti tam muñcitvā aññam gaṇam gaṇhanti

original: diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhanti, taṁ muñcitvā aññaṁ diṭṭhiṁ gaṇhanti;
analyzed: diṭṭhim gaṇhanti tam muñcitvā aññam diṭṭhim gaṇhanti

original: paṭipadaṁ gaṇhanti, taṁ muñcitvā aññaṁ paṭipadaṁ gaṇhanti;
analyzed: paṭipadam gaṇhanti tam muñcitvā aññam paṭipadam gaṇhanti

original: maggaṁ gaṇhanti, taṁ muñcitvā aññaṁ maggaṁ gaṇhanti;
analyzed: maggam gaṇhanti tam muñcitvā aññam maggam gaṇhanti

original: gaṇhanti ca muñcanti ca ādiyanti ca nirassajanti cāti—
analyzed: gaṇhanti ca muñcanti ca ādiyanti ca nirassajanti ca ati
kapī iva sākham pamuñcam gahāya āti

original: Yathā makkaṭo araññe pavane caramāno sākhaṁ gaṇhāti, taṁ muñcitvā aññaṁ sākhaṁ gaṇhāti.
analyzed: yathā makkaṭaḥ araññe pavane caramānaḥ sākham gaṇhāti tam muñcitvā aññam sākham gaṇhāti

original: Evamevaṁ puthusamaṇabrāhmaṇā puthudiṭṭhigatāni gaṇhanti ca muñcanti ca ādiyanti ca nirassajanti cāti—
analyzed: evam evam puthu samaṇa brāhmaṇā puthu diṭṭhi gatāni gaṇhanti ca muñcanti ca ādiyanti ca nirassajanti ca ati
kapī iva sākham pamuñcam gahāya āti
vidvā ca vedehi samet ca dhamma

original: Vatānīti hatthivataṁ vā assavataṁ vā govataṁ vā kukkūravataṁ vā kākavataṁ vā vāsudevavataṁ
analyzed: vatāni iti hatthivatam vā assavatam vā govatam vā kukkūravatam vā kākavatam vā vāsudevavata

original: vā baladevavataṁ vā puṇṇabhaddavataṁ vā maṇibhaddavataṁ vā aggivataṁ vā nāgavataṁ
analyzed: vā baladevavatam vā puṇṇabhaddavatam vā maṇibhaddavatam vā aggivatam vā nāgavata

original: vā supaṇṇavataṁ vā yakkhavataṁ vā asuravataṁ vā …pe…
analyzed: vā supaṇṇavatam vā yakkhavatam vā asuravatam vā pe

original: disāvataṁ vā ādāya samādāya ādiyitvā samādiyitvā gaṇhitvā parāmasitvā abhinivisitvā.
analyzed: disāvatam vā ādāya samādāya ādiyitvā samādiyitvā gaṇhitvā parāmasitvā abhinivisitvā

original: Uccāvacaṁ gacchati saññasattoti satthārato satthāraṁ gacchati;
analyzed: uccāvacam gacchati sañña satto ti satthārataḥ satthāram gacchati

original: Saññasattoti kāmasaññāya byāpādasaññāya vihiṁsāsaññāya diṭṭhisaññāya satto visatto āsatto laggo laggito palibuddho.
analyzed: sañña satto ti kāma saññāya byāpāda saññāya vihisā saññāya diṭṭhi saññāya sattaḥ visattaḥ āsattaḥ laggaḥ laggitaḥ palibuddhaḥ

original: Yathā bhittikhile vā nāgadante vā bhaṇḍaṁ sattaṁ visattaṁ āsattaṁ laggaṁ laggitaṁ
analyzed: yathā bhitti khile vā nāgadante vā bhaṇḍam sattam visattam āsattam laggam

original: palibuddhaṁ, evamevaṁ kāmasaññāya byāpādasaññāya vihiṁsāsaññāya diṭṭhisaññāya satto
analyzed: palibuddhaḥ evam evam kāma saññāya byāpāda saññāya vihisā saññāya diṭṭhi saññāya satto
visattaḥ āsattaḥ laggaḥ laggitaḥ palibuddhaḥ iti

original: Vidvāti vidvā vijjāgato ñāṇī vibhāvī medhāvī.
analyzed: vidvā ati vidvā vijjāgataḥ ñāṇī vibhāvī medhāvī

original: Vedehīti vedā vuccanti catūsu maggesu ñāṇaṁ paññā paññindriyaṁ paññābalaṁ dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo vīmaṁsā vipassanā sammādiṭṭhi.
analyzed: vedehi iti vedāḥ vuccanti catūsu maggesu ñāṇam paññā paññindriyam paññā balam dhammavicaya sambojjhaṅgaḥ vīmasā vipassanā sammādiṭṭhi

original: Tehi vedehi jātijarāmaraṇassa antagato antappatto, koṭigato koṭippatto, pariyantagato
analyzed: tehi vedehi jāti jarā maraṇassa anta gataḥ anta ppattaḥ koṭi gataḥ koṭi ppattaḥ pariyanta gataḥ

original: pariyantappatto, vosānagato vosānappatto, tāṇagato tāṇappatto, leṇagato leṇappatto,
analyzed: pariyantappattaḥ vosāna gataḥ vosāna ppattaḥ tāṇa gataḥ tāṇa ppattaḥ leṇa gataḥ leṇa ppattaḥ

original: saraṇagato saraṇappatto, abhayagato abhayappatto, accutagato accutappatto, amatagato
analyzed: saraṇa gataḥ saraṇa ppattaḥ abhaya gataḥ abhaya ppattaḥ accuta gataḥ accuta ppattaḥ amata gataḥ
amata ppattaḥ nibbāna gataḥ nibbāna ppattaḥ

original: Vedānaṁ vā antagatoti vedagū, vedehi vā antagatoti vedagū, sattannaṁ vā dhammānaṁ viditattā vedagū.
analyzed: vedānam vai antagataḥ iti vedagū vedehi vai antagataḥ iti vedagū sattannam vā dhammānam viditattā vedagū

original: Sakkāyadiṭṭhi viditā hoti, vicikicchā viditā hoti, sīlabbataparāmāso vidito hoti,
analyzed: sakkāya diṭṭhi viditā hoti vicikicchā viditā hoti sīlabbata parāmāsaḥ viditaḥ hoti

original: rāgo vidito hoti, doso vidito hoti, moho vidito hoti, māno vidito hoti, viditāssa
analyzed: rāgaḥ viditaḥ hoti dosaḥ viditaḥ hoti mohaḥ viditaḥ hoti mānaḥ viditaḥ hoti viditā assa

original: honti pāpakā akusalā dhammā saṅkilesikā ponobhavikā sadarā dukkhavipākā āyatiṁ jātijarāmaraṇiyā.
analyzed: honti pāpakā akusalā dhammā saṅkilesikā ponobhavikā sadarā dukkha vipākā āyatim jāti jarā maraṇiyā
sabbam vedam aticca vedagū so ti

original: Sabbe saṅkhārā aniccāti samecca abhisamecca dhammaṁ;
analyzed: sabbe saṅkhārāḥ aniccā ati samecca abhisamecca dhamma

original: sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhāti samecca abhisamecca dhammaṁ;
analyzed: sabbe saṅkhārā dukkhāti samecca abhisamecca dhamma

original: sabbe dhammā anattāti samecca abhisamecca dhammaṁ;
analyzed: sabbe dhammā anattā ati samecca abhisamecca dhamma
avijjā paccayā saṅkhārā ati samet ca abhisamet ca dhamma
saṅkhāra paccayā viññāṇanti samet ca abhisamet ca dhamma
jāti paccayā jarā maraṇanti samecca abhisamecca dhamma
avijjā nirodhā saṅkhāra nirodhā ti samet ca abhisamet ca dhamma
saṅkhāra nirodhā viññāṇa nirodho ti samet ca abhisamet ca dhamma
viññāṇa nirodhā nāma rūpa nirodhā ti
jāti nirodhā jarā maraṇa nirodhā uti samet ca abhisamet ca dhamma
idam dukkhanti samet ca abhisamet ca dhamma

original: ayaṁ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti samecca abhisamecca dhammaṁ;
analyzed: ayam dukkha nirodha gāminī paṭipadā ati samet ca abhisamet ca dhamma

original: ayaṁ āsavanirodhagāminī paṭipadāti samecca abhisamecca dhammaṁ;
analyzed: ayam āsava nirodha gāminī paṭipadā ati samet ca abhisamet ca dhamma

original: ime dhammā abhiññeyyāti samecca abhisamecca dhammaṁ;
analyzed: ime dhammā samet ca abhisamet ca

original: ime dhammā sacchikātabbāti samecca abhisamecca dhammaṁ.
analyzed: ime dhammā sacchikātabbā ati samecca abhisamecca dhamma

original: Channaṁ phassāyatanānaṁ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca samecca abhisamecca dhammaṁ.
analyzed: channam samudayam ca atthaṅgamam ca assādam ca ādīnavam ca nissaraṇañca samet ca abhisamet ca dhamma

original: Pañcannaṁ upādānakkhandhānaṁ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca samecca abhisamecca dhammaṁ.
analyzed: pañcannam upādānakkhandhānam samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca samet ca abhisamet ca dhamma

original: Catunnaṁ mahābhūtānaṁ samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca samecca abhisamecca dhammaṁ.
analyzed: catunnam mahābhūtānam samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca samet ca abhisamet ca dhamma

original: Yaṁ kiñci samudayadhammaṁ sabbaṁ taṁ nirodhadhammanti samecca abhisamecca dhammanti—
analyzed: yam kiñci samudaya dhammam sabbam tam nirodha dhamman ti samet ca abhisamet ca dhamman ti
vidvā ca vedehi samet ca dhamma

original: Na uccāvacaṁ gacchati bhūripaññoti na satthārato satthāraṁ gacchati, na dhammakkhānato
analyzed: na uccāvacam gacchati bhūri pañño ti na satthārataḥ satthāram gacchati na dhammakkhānataḥ

original: dhammakkhānaṁ gacchati, na gaṇato gaṇaṁ gacchati, na diṭṭhiyā diṭṭhiṁ gacchati, na
analyzed: dhamma kkhānam gacchati na gaṇataḥ gaṇam gacchati na diṭṭhiyāḥ diṭṭhim gacchati na

original: paṭipadāya paṭipadaṁ gacchati, na maggato maggaṁ gacchati.
analyzed: paṭipadāya paṭipadam gacchati na maggataḥ maggam gacchati

original: Bhūripaññoti bhūripañño mahāpañño puthupañño hāsapañño javanapañño tikkhapañño nibbedhikapañño.
analyzed: bhūri paññoti bhūri paññaḥ mahā pañño puthu paññaḥ hāsa paññaḥ javana paññaḥ tikkha paññaḥ nibbedhika pañño

original: Tāya pathavisamāya paññāya vipulāya vitthatāya samannāgatoti—
analyzed: tāya pathavi samāya paññāya vipulāya vitthatāya samannāgataḥ ti
vidvā ca vedehi samet ca dhamma
na uccāvacam gacchati bhūri paññā iti

original: Yaṁ kiñci diṭṭhaṁ va sutaṁ mutaṁ vā;
analyzed: yam kiñci diṭṭham vā sutam mutam vā

original: Sa sabbadhammesu visenibhūto yaṁ kiñci diṭṭhaṁ va sutaṁ mutaṁ vāti.
analyzed: sa sabba dhammesu viseni bhūtaḥ yam kiñci diṭṭham va sutam mutam vā ati

original: Kāyaduccaritaṁ mārasenā, vacīduccaritaṁ mārasenā, manoduccaritaṁ mārasenā, rāgo mārasenā,
analyzed: kāya duccaritam māra senā vacī duccaritam māra senā manaḥ duccaritam māra senā rāgaḥ māra senā

original: doso mārasenā, moho mārasenā, kodho mārasenā, upanāho …pe… sabbākusalābhisaṅkhārā mārasenā.
analyzed: dosaḥ māra senā mohaḥ māra senā kodhaḥ māra senā upanāhaḥ pe sabba akusala abhisaṅkhārāḥ māra senā

original: Yato catūhi ariyamaggehi sabbā ca mārasenā sabbe ca paṭisenikarā kilesā jitā ca parājitā ca bhaggā vippaluggā parammukhā, so vuccati visenibhūto.
analyzed: yatas catūhi ariya maggehi sabbā ca māra senā sabbe ca paṭiseni karā kilesā jitā ca parājitā ca bhaggā vippaluggā parammukhā so vuccati viseni bhūtaḥ

original: So diṭṭhe visenibhūto, sute visenibhūto, mute visenibhūto, viññāte visenibhūtoti—
analyzed: so diṭṭhe visenibhūto sute visenibhūtaḥ mute visenibhūtaḥ viññāte visenibhūtaḥ

original: sa sabbadhammesu visenibhūto yaṁ kiñci diṭṭhaṁ va sutaṁ mutaṁ vā.
analyzed: sa sabba dhammesu viseni bhūtaḥ yam kiñci diṭṭham va sutam mutam vā

original: Tameva suddhadassiṁ visuddhadassiṁ parisuddhadassiṁ vodātadassiṁ pariyodātadassiṁ.
analyzed: tam eva suddha dassim visuddha dassim parisuddha dassim vodāta dassim pariyodāta dassi

original: Atha vā, suddhadassanaṁ visuddhadassanaṁ parisuddhadassanaṁ vodātadassanaṁ pariyodātadassanaṁ.
analyzed: atha vā suddha dassanam visuddha dassanam parisuddha dassanam vodāta dassanam pariyodāta dassana

original: Vivaṭanti taṇhāchadanaṁ diṭṭhichadanaṁ kilesachadanaṁ duccaritachadanaṁ avijjāchadanaṁ.
analyzed: vivaṭanti taṇhā chadanam diṭṭhi chadanam kilesa chadanam duccarita chadanam avijjā chadana

original: Tāni chadanāni vivaṭāni honti viddhaṁsitāni ugghāṭitāni samugghāṭitāni pahīnāni samucchinnāni vūpasantāni paṭipassaddhāni abhabbuppattikāni ñāṇagginā daḍḍhāni.
analyzed: tāni chadanāni vivaṭāni honti viddhasitāni ugghāṭitāni samugghāṭitāni pahīnāni samucchinnāni vūpasantāni paṭipassaddhāni abhabbuppattikāni ñāṇa agginā daḍḍhāni

original: Carantanti carantaṁ vicarantaṁ viharantaṁ iriyantaṁ vattentaṁ pālentaṁ yapentaṁ yāpentanti—
analyzed: carantanti carantam vicarantam viharantam iriyantam vattentam pālentam yapentam yāpentanti
taṇhā kappo ca diṭṭhi kappo ca pe
tassa taṇhā kappaḥ pahīnaḥ diṭṭhi kappaḥ paṭinissaṭṭho

original: Taṇhākappassa pahīnattā diṭṭhikappassa paṭinissaṭṭhattā kena rāgena kappeyya, kena
analyzed: taṇhā kappassa pahīna ttā diṭṭhi kappassa paṭinissaṭṭha ttā kena rāgena kappeyya kena

original: dosena kappeyya, kena mohena kappeyya, kena mānena kappeyya, kāya diṭṭhiyā kappeyya,
analyzed: dosena kappeyya kena mohena kappeyya kena mānena kappeyya kāya diṭṭhiyā kappeyya

original: kena uddhaccena kappeyya, kāya vicikicchāya kappeyya, kehi anusayehi kappeyya—
analyzed: kena uddhaccena kappeyya kāya vicikicchāya kappeyya kehi anusayehi kappeyya

original: rattoti vā duṭṭhoti vā mūḷhoti vā vinibaddhoti vā parāmaṭṭhoti vā vikkhepagatoti vā aniṭṭhaṅgatoti vā thāmagatoti vā.
analyzed: rattoti vā duṭṭhoti vā mūḷhoti vā vinibaddhoti vā parāmaṭṭhoti vā vikkhepa gatoti vā aniṭṭhaṅgatoti vā thāma gatoti vā

original: nerayikoti vā tiracchānayonikoti vā pettivisayikoti vā manussoti vā devoti vā rūpīti vā arūpīti vā saññīti vā asaññīti vā nevasaññīnāsaññīti vā.
analyzed: nerayikaḥ ti vā tiracchānayonikaḥ ti vā pettivisayikaḥ ti vā manusso ti vā devaḥ iti vā rūpī iti vā arūpī iti vā saññī iti vā asaññī iti vā nevasaññīnāsaññī iti vā

original: So hetu natthi, paccayo natthi, kāraṇaṁ natthi, yena kappeyya vikappeyya vikappaṁ āpajjeyya.
analyzed: so hetu natthi paccayaḥ natthi kāraṇam natthi yena kappeyya vikappeyya vikappam āpajjeyya

original: Lokasminti apāyaloke manussaloke devaloke khandhaloke dhātuloke āyatanaloketi—
analyzed: lokasmin ti apāya loke manussa loke deva loke khandha loke dhātu loke āyatana loke iti

original: Yaṁ kiñci diṭṭhaṁ va sutaṁ mutaṁ vā;
analyzed: yam kiñci diṭṭham vā sutam mutam vā
taṇhā kappo ca diṭṭhi kappo ca pe
tesam taṇhā kappaḥ pahīnaḥ diṭṭhi kappaḥ paṭinissaṭṭhaḥ

original: Taṇhākappassa pahīnattā, diṭṭhikappassa paṭinissaṭṭhattā taṇhākappaṁ vā diṭṭhikappaṁ vā na kappenti na janenti na sañjanenti na nibbattenti nābhinibbattentīti—
analyzed: taṇhā kappassa pahīna ttā diṭṭhi kappassa paṭinissaṭṭha ttā taṇhā kappam vā diṭṭhi kappam vā na kappenti na janenti na sañjanenti na nibbattenti na abhinibbattenti iti
taṇhā purekkhāro ca diṭṭhi purekkhāro ca pe
tesam taṇhā purekkhāraḥ pahīnaḥ diṭṭhi purekkhāraḥ paṭinissaṭṭho

original: Taṇhāpurekkhārassa pahīnattā, diṭṭhipurekkhārassa paṭinissaṭṭhattā na taṇhaṁ vā na
analyzed: taṇhā purekkhārassa pahīna ttā diṭṭhi purekkhārassa paṭinissaṭṭha ttā na taṇham vā na

original: diṭṭhiṁ vā purato katvā caranti, na taṇhādhajā na taṇhāketū na taṇhādhipateyyā, na
analyzed: diṭṭhim vā puratas katvā caranti na taṇhā dhajāḥ na taṇhā ketū na taṇhā ādhipateyyāḥ na

original: diṭṭhidhajā na diṭṭhiketū na diṭṭhādhipateyyā, na taṇhāya vā na diṭṭhiyā vā parivāritā carantīti—
analyzed: diṭṭhi dhajā na diṭṭhi ketū na diṭṭha ādhipateyyā na taṇhāya vā na diṭṭhiyā vā parivāritā caranti iti

original: Accantasuddhīti na te vadantīti accantasuddhiṁ saṁsārasuddhiṁ akiriyadiṭṭhiṁ sassatavādaṁ na vadanti na kathenti na bhaṇanti na dīpayanti na voharantīti—
analyzed: accanta suddhi iti na te vadanti iti accanta suddhim sa sāra suddhim a kiriya diṭṭhim sa sata vādam na vadanti na kathenti na bhaṇanti na dīpayanti na voharanti iti

original: abhijjhākāyagantho, byāpādo kāyagantho, sīlabbataparāmāso kāyagantho, idaṁsaccābhiniveso kāyagantho.
analyzed: abhijjhā kāya ganthaḥ byāpādaḥ kāya ganthaḥ sīlabbata parāmāsaḥ kāya ganthaḥ idam sacca abhinivesaḥ kāya ganthaḥ
attanaḥ diṭṭhiyā rāgaḥ abhijjhā kāya gantho

original: attano sīlaṁ vā vataṁ vā sīlavataṁ vā parāmasantīti sīlabbataparāmāso kāyagantho, attano diṭṭhi idaṁsaccābhiniveso kāyagantho.
analyzed: attano sīlam vā vatam vā sīlavatam vā parāmasanti iti sīlabbata parāmāsaḥ kāya gantho attano diṭṭhi idasacca abhiniveso kāya gantho

original: Tehi ganthehi rūpaṁ ādiyanti upādiyanti gaṇhanti parāmasanti abhinivisanti;
analyzed: tehi ganthehi rūpam ādiyanti upādiyanti gaṇhanti parāmasanti abhinivisanti

original: saṁsāravaṭṭaṁ ādiyanti upādiyanti gaṇhanti parāmasanti abhinivisanti.
analyzed: sa sāravaṭṭam ādiyanti upādiyanti gaṇhanti parāmasanti abhinivisanti

original: Atha vā ganthe gadhite ganthite bandhe vibandhe ābandhe lagge laggite palibuddhe bandhane phoṭayitvā—
analyzed: atha vā ganthe gadhite ganthite bandhe vibandhe ābandhe lagge laggite palibuddhe bandhane phoṭayitvā

original: Yathā vayhaṁ vā rathaṁ vā sakaṭaṁ vā sandamānikaṁ vā sajjaṁ visajjaṁ karonti vikopenti;
analyzed: yathā vayham vā ratham vā sakaṭam vā sandamānikam vā sajjam visajjam karonti vikopenti

original: Atha vā ganthe gathite ganthite bandhe vibandhe ābandhe lagge laggite palibuddhe bandhane phoṭayitvā visajjāti—
analyzed: atha vā ganthe gathite ganthite bandhe vibandhe ābandhe lagge laggite palibuddhe bandhane phoṭayitvā visajjāti
āsam na kubbanti kuhiñci loke iti

original: Āsā vuccati taṇhā yo rāgo sārāgo …pe… abhijjhā lobho akusalamūlaṁ.
analyzed: āsā vuccati taṇhā yaḥ rāgaḥ sa arāgaḥ pe abhijjhā lobho akusala mūla

original: Āsaṁ na kubbantīti āsaṁ na kubbanti na janenti na sañjanenti na nibbattenti na abhinibbattenti.
analyzed: āsam na kubbanti iti āsam na kubbanti na janenti na sañjanenti na nibbattenti na abhinibbattenti

original: Kuhiñcīti kuhiñci kimhici katthaci ajjhattaṁ vā bahiddhā vā ajjhattabahiddhā vā.
analyzed: kuhiñci iti kuhiñci kimhici katthaci ajjhattam vā bahiddhā vā ajjhatta bahiddhā vā
loka iti apāya loke pe āyatana loka iti
āsam na kubbanti kuhiñci loke iti
na rāga rāgī na virāga rattaḥ

original: Sīmātigo brāhmaṇo tassa natthi, ñatvā va disvā va samuggahītanti.
analyzed: sīmātigaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ tassa na atthi ñatvā va disvā va samuggahītanti

original: sakkāyadiṭṭhi, vicikicchā, sīlabbataparāmāso, diṭṭhānusayo, vicikicchānusayo, tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesā—
analyzed: sakkāya diṭṭhi vicikicchā sīlabbata parāmāsaḥ diṭṭha anusayaḥ vicikicchā anusayo tad ekaṭṭhā ca kilesā

original: Oḷārikaṁ kāmarāgasaṁyojanaṁ, paṭighasaṁyojanaṁ, oḷāriko kāmarāgānusayo, paṭighānusayo, tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesā—
analyzed: oḷārikaṃ kāma rāga sayojana paṭigha sayojanaḥ oḷārikaḥ kāma rāga anusayo paṭigha anusayo tad ekaṭṭhā ca kilesā

original: Anusahagataṁ kāmarāgasaṁyojanaṁ, paṭighasaṁyojanaṁ, anusahagato kāmarāgānusayo, paṭighānusayo, tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesā—
analyzed: anu sahagatam kāma rāga sayojana paṭigha sayojana anu sahagataḥ kāma rāga anusayo paṭigha anusayo tad ekaṭṭhā ca kilesā

original: Rūparāgo arūparāgo māno uddhaccaṁ avijjā, mānānusayo bhavarāgānusayo avijjānusayo, tadekaṭṭhā ca kilesā—
analyzed: rūpa rāgaḥ arūpa rāgaḥ mānaḥ uddhaccam avijjā māna anusayaḥ bhava rāga anusayaḥ avijjā anusayaḥ tad ekaṭṭhā ca kilesā

original: Yato ca catūhi ariyamaggehi imā catasso sīmāyo atikkanto hoti samatikkanto vītivatto, so vuccati sīmātigo.
analyzed: yatas ca catūhi ariya maggehi imāḥ catasso sīmāyaḥ atikkantaḥ hoti samatikkantaḥ vītivatto so vuccati sīmātigo
brāhmaṇo ti sattannam dhammānam bāhitattā brāhmaṇo

original: sakkāyadiṭṭhi bāhitā hoti, vicikicchā bāhitā hoti, sīlabbataparāmāso bāhito hoti …pe…
analyzed: sakkāya diṭṭhi bāhitā hoti vicikicchā bāhitā hoti sīlabbata parāmāsaḥ bāhitaḥ hoti pe
asitaḥ ta ādi pavuccate sa brahmā

original: Ñatvāti paracittañāṇena vā ñatvā pubbenivāsānussatiñāṇena vā ñatvā.
analyzed: ñatvā ti para citta ñāṇena vā ñatvā pubbenivāsa anussati ñāṇena vā ñatvā

original: Disvāti maṁsacakkhunā vā disvā dibbacakkhunā vā disvā.
analyzed: disvā ti masa cakkhunā vā disvā dibba cakkhunā vā disvā

original: Sīmātigo brāhmaṇo tassa natthi, ñatvā va disvā va samuggahītanti.
analyzed: sīmātigaḥ brāhmaṇaḥ tassa na atthi ñatvā va disvā va samuggahītanti

original: Tassa idaṁ paramaṁ aggaṁ seṭṭhaṁ visiṭṭhaṁ pāmokkhaṁ uttamaṁ pavaranti gahitaṁ parāmaṭṭhaṁ
analyzed: tassa idam paramam aggam seṭṭham visiṭṭham pāmokkham uttamam pavaranti gahitam parāmaṭṭha

original: abhiniviṭṭhaṁ ajjhositaṁ adhimuttaṁ natthi na santi na saṁvijjati nupalabbhati, pahīnaṁ

na rāga rāgī na virāga rattā uti

original: Rāgarattā vuccanti ye pañcasu kāmaguṇesu rattā giddhā gadhitā mucchitā ajjhosannā laggā laggitā palibuddhā.

original: Na rāgarāgī na virāgarattoti yato kāmarāgo ca rūparāgo ca arūparāgo ca pahīnā honti ucchinnamūlā tālāvatthukatā anabhāvaṅkatā āyatiṁ anuppādadhammā.
